name: Benjy Duke
goals: Complete the 75-miler course of the 2026 SBT GRVL with no pain and a respectable time. Finish in the top third of age bracket. Complete majority of training by June 1st and maintain fitness in June (job prevents extensive training).
strengths: Endurance overall. Balance. General athletics. Competitive half marathon runner (1st in age group). MTB experience since childhood.
weaknesses: New to bike racing. Don't know cycling training thresholds. Limited to 3-4 biking days per week.
strength_routine: Body weight, power yoga, core, balance work
injuries: Herniated L4/L5 discs in 2019. Recovered through extensive PT and routine stretching. Back occasionally tightens up and takes a day or two of stretching to work out.
devices: Heart rate monitor, power meter, GPS device, smartphone app, Wahoo ELEMNT bolt
experience_detail: New to gravel biking but mountain biked whole life. Never raced on a bike. Marathon runner — raced one full marathon and several halves, placed 1st in age group for half marathon last summer. Training with friends Kyle Cocowitch and Burk Knowlton for SBT GRVL.
schedule_notes: Two kids at home. Training time is either early AM (5:30) or after kids go to bed. Job in June will prevent extensive training — wants majority of work done by June 1 with maintenance through race.
